Package algorithms

Class BranchingSearch

java.lang.Object
algorithms.BranchingSearch
public class BranchingSearch extends Object
Contains an advanced algorithms for searching pentomino configurations on a grid.

  • Method Details

    • basicSearch

      public static boolean basicSearch(int[][] field, int index, char[] input)
      Executes a recursive search algorithm to find a suitable configuration for placing pentominoes on the given grid. It tries to fit each pentomino on the grid and recursively checks the next pentomino until all are placed or no configuration is found.
      Parameters:
      field - The 2D grid representing the current state of the field, where -1 indicates an empty space and any other number indicates a placed pentomino piece.
      index - The current index in the input character array, which guides which pentomino is currently being attempted to place on the grid.
      input - An array of characters, where each character represents a unique type of pentomino piece to be placed on the grid.
      Returns:
      true if a solution is found where all pentominoes from the input are placed on the grid without overlap, false otherwise.

    • matchPatternInField

      public static boolean matchPatternInField(int[][] pattern, int[][] field, int xOffset, int yOffset)
      Checks if a pattern can be found within the field/grid.
      Parameters:
      pattern - A matrix representing the pattern to find.
      field - The current state of the field/grid.
      xOffset - Optional X offset for starting the search.
      yOffset - Optional Y offset for starting the search.
      Returns:
      true if the pattern matches, false otherwise.

    • hasBlockAt

      public static boolean hasBlockAt(int[][] field, int fieldX, int fieldY)
      Checks if a block (non-empty cell) exists at the specified position in the field.
      Parameters:
      field - The current state of the field.
      fieldX - X-coordinate in the field.
      fieldY - Y-coordinate in the field.
      Returns:
      true if a block exists, false otherwise.

    • canPlace

      public static boolean canPlace(int[][] piece, int col, int row, int[][] field)
      Determines if a given pentomino piece can be placed at the specified position on the field/grid.
      Parameters:
      piece - The pentomino piece.
      col - Column to place the piece.
      row - Row to place the piece.
      field - The current state of the field/grid.
      Returns:
      true if the piece can be placed, false otherwise.
